meanings.definition: A type of bird known for building dome-shaped nests on the ground.
meanings.sent1: The ovenbirds carefully construct their nests on the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of ovenbirds building their nests near the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ovenbirds choose to be architects of the forest floor?
meanings.sent4: The ovenbirds' nests are like tiny ovens baking in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The dome-shaped nests of the ovenbirds resemble cozy homes for tiny creatures.

meanings.definition: A group of birds in the family Furnariidae, known for their unique nest-building behavior.
meanings.sent1: The ovenbirds in this region are famous for their intricate nests.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of ovenbirds to understand their nest-building techniques.
meanings.sent3: The ovenbirds decided to host a nest-building competition.
meanings.sent4: In the world of birds, the ovenbirds are the master architects.
meanings.sent5: The ovenbirds' nest-building skills are unmatched in the avian world.
